name: AI Pong
description:
Welcome to my game's Itch.io page.

This is... as you can see a classic pong game but its single player.

Controls:

You can controll your paddle with your mouse and right click to spawn the ball.

There are Four difficulties which you can choose from

Easy, Intermediate, Hard and Impossible

Browser game is set to Easy mode. Download the game for full version.

Impossible is Literally impossible, if you ever manage to beat Impossible difficulty, Please lemme know.

That's all I have to say, ahhhh.... and yes share this page if you like this game. Also, Please comment 'YEET' if you are reading this
